ctx: Dieselgate še živi, tokrat v preiskavi BMW dvolitrski dizel
content:
Medtem:

Most passenger cars in the European Union still emit the same
quantity of carbon dioxide as 12 years ago

Over the last decade, emissions have remained constant for diesel
cars, while they have marginally decreased (-4.6 %) for petrol
cars,” the auditors said in a statement. “Technological progress in
terms of engine efficiency is outweighed by increased vehicle mass
(about +10 % on average) and more powerful engines (+25 % on
average).”


qz.com/zero-emission...1851195093

Očitno vgrajevanje 2 ali manj literskih in podobnih navitih kavnih
mlinčkov v avtomobile ni prineslo prav nikakršne spremembe pri
količni co2
author: 0730ULtra3

motorjev/vozil
In povečanja stroškov servisiranja...
